message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair, right?
I want a bit more, as I'm the one taking the risk of the money losing value in the next rounds.
Okay, I'll give you a slight edge this time, but let's try to be reasonable here.  We both want to get something.
Inflation is starting to kick in, and I'm not getting any younger. I need a better deal to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to compromise a little more to avoid further losses from inflation.  Let's call it a day.
